title: DeFi vs. Traditional Finance
description: One-minute skill: DeFi vs. Traditional Finance.

hook.text: Traditional banks take days to settle transfers. DeFi settles in seconds. But the tradeoffs are enormous.

buildup.text: Banks offer deposit insurance, fraud protection, and customer service. DeFi offers none of that.

discovery.text: DeFi offers transparency â€” every transaction is on a public ledger. Banks operate in a black box.

twist.text: That transparency cuts both ways. Everyone can see your balances, trades, and financial history.

climax.text: DeFi is faster, cheaper, and more open. It's also riskier, harder, and completely unforgiving of mistakes.

punchline.text: DeFi trades safety nets for speed and freedom.

quiz.question: What does DeFi sacrifice compared to traditional finance?
options: Deposit insurance, fraud protection, and customer service
